{pages:['[["Manufacturing Sickles:\\n\\n1x Iron Hoe\\n64x Wheat Seed\\n1x Diamond\\nAll materials need to be put together on an anvil."]]','[["Usable Seedtypes\\n\\nWheat Seeds\\nBeetroot Seeds\\nCarrots\\nPotatoes\\nNetherwarts"]]','[["Charging of Sickles\\n\\nTo charge, place exactly 64 seeds of one of the listed types and the Sickle on a crafting table.\\n\\nIf charged with other seeds, the old ones will be deleted.\\n "]]'],title:"Manufacturing Sickles",author:"unknown",generation:1,display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Manufacturing Sickles","italic":false,"color":"#669933"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Creation and Charging of Sickles","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}
